name: DanganRonpa: IT'S SHOWTIME! Chapter 3
description:
16 Contestants partake in a reality tv show in hopes for prizes beyond their wildest dreams. Of course, nothing is as it seems.

DanganRonpa: IT'S SHOWTIME! is a non-profit fangame inspired by the DanganRonpa game series. Please support support the official release.

Run Time: Roughly 2 Hours (FTEs included)
